author: Andrej Karpathy
title: microgpt: My 200-line Art Project
original: This is a single file of 200 lines of pure Python with no dependencies that trains and inferences a GPT. It contains: dataset of documents, tokenizer, autograd engine, a GPT-2-like neural network architecture, Adam optimizer, training and inference loop. Everything else is just efficiency. I cannot simplify this any further. I think it is beautiful ğŸ¥¹.

author: Fei-Fei Li
title: The Worlds I See: A Human-Centered AI Vision
original: Artificial Intelligence is no longer just a technical pursuit; it is a human one. Our challenge is to build machines that perceive the world as humans do, while ensuring they serve human values. My new research explores Spatial Intelligence as the next frontier for computer vision.
